Articles.Content:
I think it would be fun to have a giftshop, of sorts, at the KSC. It could be used as a sort of trophy room showing your progress. Items could include...

Postcards - Screenshots you've taken overlaid with some colorful text.

Moon Rocks - Surface samples you've returned.

Planetary Dioramas - Places you've returned a Kerbal or Probe from.

Miniatures - Model rockets of the ships you've launched with cheap little plastic stands.

I'm sure theres other things to but I'd really like someplace fun I could go to to look back on where I've been that isn't too serious.
A museum (which has been suggested numerous times by many other users) would be a more appropriate means of displaying one's achievements than a gift shop.
Sorry, didn't see that listed in the "Already Suggested" thread. =)
